SEARCH

Class STV

java.lang.Object
STV
public class STV extends Object
Creates and executes an STV election. Vote tabulation, calculate droop, remove ballots and candidates, display results, and generate audit

  • Constructor Details

    • STV

      public STV(boolean shuffle, int numSeats, int numCandidates, int numBallots, ArrayList<Candidate> candidates, ArrayList<Ballot> ballots, String fileName)
      Constructor for STV
      Parameters:
      shuffle - : toggle for shuffle on/off
      numSeats - : number of seats to fill
      numCandidates - : number of candidates
      numBallots - : number of ballots
      candidates - : list of candidate objects
      ballots - : list of ballot objects
      fileName - : name of the audit file to be created

  • Method Details

    • calculateDroop

      public int calculateDroop(int numBallots, int numSeats)
      Calculates the droop quota for the STV election.
      Parameters:
      numBallots - The number of ballots cast in the election.
      numSeats - The number of seats to be filled in the election.
      Returns:
      The droop quota used to determine the minimum number of votes required to win.

    • setDroopQuota

      public void setDroopQuota(int droop)
      Sets the droop quota for the election.
      Parameters:
      droop - The droop quota to be set.

    • getDroopQuota

      public int getDroopQuota()
      Retrieves the current droop quota.
      Returns:
      The current droop quota.

    • shuffleBallots

      public void shuffleBallots()
      Shuffles the list of ballots randomly.

    • removeBallot

      public void removeBallot(Ballot ballot)
      Removes the specified ballot from the list of ballots.
      Parameters:
      ballot - The ballot to be removed.

    • distributeVotes

      public void distributeVotes()
      Distributes votes across candidates, eliminating candidates with the least votes and re-tabulating ballots until the required number of seats is filled.

    • eliminateCandidate

      public Candidate eliminateCandidate()
      Eliminates candidate with least number of votes.
      Returns:
      The candidate to be eliminated.

    • checkBallotCandidate

      public Candidate checkBallotCandidate(Ballot ballot, int rank)
      Retrieves ballot's highest ranked active candidate or eliminates ballot if no such candidate.
      Parameters:
      ballot - The ballot whose ranked candidates are being checked.
      rank - The rank to be checked.
      Returns:
      The active candidate at the highest possible rank or null if so such candidate.

    • getRankCandidate

      public Candidate getRankCandidate(Ballot ballot, int rank)
      Retrieves the candidate ranked at the given rank for the specified ballot.
      Parameters:
      ballot - The ballot whose ranked candidates are being checked.
      rank - The rank to be checked.
      Returns:
      The candidate at the specified rank.

    • settleTies

      public Candidate settleTies(ArrayList<Candidate> tiedCandidates)
      Resolves a tie between candidates by prioritizing the candidate with the highest rank on their first vote, and then by the ballot index.
      Parameters:
      tiedCandidates - A list of candidates who are tied.
      Returns:
      The candidate who is to be eliminated from the tie.

    • displayResults

      public void displayResults(String electionName)
      Displays the election results, including the election type, number of ballots, seats to be filled, number of candidates, winners, and losers (if any). For each winner and loser, their name and vote percentage relative to the total number of ballots are displayed. Winners and losers are listed in the order they appear in their respective lists.
      Parameters:
      electionName - The name or type of the election to be displayed.

    • generateAudit

      public File generateAudit(String electionName)
      Generates an audit file containing detailed election results, including winners and losers, their vote percentages, and the order of ballots cast for each candidate. If the file already exists, the method prints an error message and terminates the program. If an I/O error occurs during file creation or writing, an error message is printed and the program exits.
      Parameters:
      electionName - The name or type of the election to be recorded in the audit file.
      Returns:
      A file pointer to the newly created audit file

    • startElection

      public void startElection()
      Calls all helper functions to run a STV election from start to finish.
